H0.text: Which method of painting consists of applying pigment to wet plaster. Sgraffito

H1.text: Which method of painting consists of applying pigment to wet plaster. Encaustic

H2.text: Which method of painting consists of applying pigment to wet plaster. Gouache

H3.text: Which method of painting consists of applying pigment to wet plaster. Fresco

A4.text: Fresco is a technique of mural painting executed upon freshly laid ('wet') lime plaster.

A5.text: Buon fresco pigment is mixed with room temperature water and is used on a thin layer of wet, fresh plaster, called the intonaco.
